stripped_text: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is stolen. The play cost of each operation and event is increased by 1. The first time the Runner plays an event each turn, gain 1 credit.
text: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is stolen. The play cost of each operation and event is increased by 1. The first time the Runner plays an event each turn, gain 1[credit].
title: Rolling Brownout
